Black hair coat is dominant over white hair coat. Three quarters of the offspring have black coats, and one quarter have white coats. The genotypes of the parents were most likely

A. Bb × Bb

B. BB × BB and Bb × bb

C. bb × Bb

D. bb × bb

E. bb × BB

F. Bb × bb

G. Bb × BB

H. BB × Bb

I. BB × bb

J. BB × BB

Answer with only a single letter. Answer:<|im_end|>

D. bb × bb

E. bb × BB
